welcomeSub: Burst your bubble and meet new friends!
policyPrompt: By signing up you agree to our terms and privacy policy.
supplyEducationEmail: An EDU email address must be supplied.
registerWarn: Pop is currently exclusive for students. Please enter in your @utexas.edu to sign up!
errorRequest: There was an error in your request.
name: Name
customTagSubmissionBrief: By adding a custom tag, it can be publicly submitted to be seen by the entire community to help others find your group easier.
reportDescription: Help us make POP a better place. If you see something wrong, report it!
groupJoinPrompt: Enter the 6 digit code for your group to join
groupCreateTagSuggestion: Add tags to make your group easier to find
groupInfoInviteDescription: Groups are more fun with friends! Invite your friends on the POP app to join
registrationSetPersonalityTitle: Use the sliders to help us get a better sense of your personality.
